trans-unit.source: Represents a collection of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"></xref> control.
trans-unit.target: Representa uma coleção de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objetos no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView"> </xref> controlo.

trans-unit.source: This class cannot be inherited.
trans-unit.target: Esta classe não pode ser herdada.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCollection class is used to store and manage a collection of <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control.
trans-unit.target: A classe de TreeNodeCollection é utilizada para armazenar e gerir uma coleção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>controlo.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control uses the TreeNodeCollection class in two of its properties.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>controlo utiliza a classe de TreeNodeCollection em duas as respetivas propriedades.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: It stores its root nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> property and its selected nodes in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Armazena os respetivos nós raiz no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>propriedade e respetivos nós selecionados no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.CheckedNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCollection collection is also used for the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> property to store child nodes (if any).
trans-unit.target: A coleção de TreeNodeCollection também é utilizada para o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>propriedade para armazenar os nós subordinados (se aplicável).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCollection class supports several ways to access the items in the collection: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Item%2A> indexer to retrieve a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object directly at a specific zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: A classe de TreeNodeCollection suporta várias formas de aceder aos itens na coleção:-Utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Item%2A>indexador para obter um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto diretamente num índice baseado em zero específico.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Item%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>método para criar um enumerador que pode ser utilizado para iterar através da coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: - Use `foreach` (C#) or `For Each` (Visual Basic) to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: -Utilizar `foreach` (c#) ou `For Each` (Visual Basic) para iterar através da coleção.

trans-unit.source: - Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the collection into an <xref:System.Array> object.
trans-unit.target: -Utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>método para copiar o conteúdo da coleção para um <xref:System.Array>objeto.</xref:System.Array> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can programmatically manage the TreeNodeCollection by adding and removing <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: Pode gerir programaticamente o TreeNodeCollection através da adição e remoção de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: To add nodes to the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para adicionar nós à coleção, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A>

trans-unit.source: To remove nodes from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para remover nós da coleção, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>, <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>, ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView> control is bound to a data source, the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> and <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> collections are automatically populated each time binding occurs.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Quando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>controlo está vinculado a uma origem de dados, o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A>e <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A>coleções são preenchidas automaticamente sempre que ocorre o enlace.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode.ChildNodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView.Nodes%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeView>

trans-unit.source: Any changes to the collections between bindings will be lost.
trans-unit.target: Quaisquer alterações às coleções entre enlaces serão perdidas.

trans-unit.source: To retain these changes, either update the data source or manually rebuild the collection each time you bind.
trans-unit.target: Para manter estas alterações, atualizar a origem de dados ou reconstruir manualmente a coleção sempre que vincular.

trans-unit.source: The TreeNodeCollection contains properties and methods that allow you to retrieve information about the collection itself.
trans-unit.target: O TreeNodeCollection contém propriedades e métodos que lhe permitem obter informações sobre a própria coleção.

trans-unit.source: To find out how many items are in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Count%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: Para determinar o número de itens está na coleção, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Count%2A>propriedade.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Count%2A>

trans-unit.source: If you want to determine whether the collection contains a certain <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Contains%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Se pretende determinar se a coleção contém uma determinada <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Contains%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Contains%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: To get the index of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IndexOf%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o índice de uma <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto da coleção, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IndexOf%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IndexOf%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> class using the default values.
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> classe utilizando os valores predefinidos.

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> class using the default values.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>classe utilizando os valores predefinidos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of root nodes where a parent node (or owner) is not required.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é usado normalmente quando criar uma coleção de nós raiz em que um nó principal (ou o proprietário) não é necessário.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When creating a collection of non-root nodes, you should use the overloaded constructor that takes the `owner` parameter, instead of this constructor, to specify the parent node.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao criar uma coleção de nós não raiz, deve utilizar o construtor sobrecarregado, que utiliza o `owner` parâmetro, em vez deste construtor, para especificar o nó principal.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> class using the specified parent node (or owner).
trans-unit.target: Inicializa uma nova instância do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> classe utilizando o nó principal especificado (ou o proprietário).

trans-unit.source: Use this constructor to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> class using the specified parent node (or owner).
trans-unit.target: Utilize este construtor para inicializar uma nova instância do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>classe utilizando o nó principal especificado (ou o proprietário).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This constructor is commonly used when creating a collection of non-root nodes where you need to specify the parent node.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é usado normalmente quando criar uma coleção de nós não raiz onde tem de especificar o nó principal.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > When creating a collection of root nodes, consider using the default constructor because root nodes do not have a parent node.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Ao criar uma coleção de nós raiz, considere utilizar o construtor predefinido porque o nós raiz não tem um nó principal.

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used primarily by control developers.
trans-unit.target: Este construtor é utilizado principalmente pelos programadores de controlo.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object that represents the parent node of the collection.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto que representa o nó principal da coleção.

trans-unit.source: Appends the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to the end of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Acrescenta especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto até ao fim do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Add method to append the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método Add a acrescentar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto ao fim do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> especificado

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> allows you to add null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>permite adicionar referências nulo (Nothing em Visual Basic), bem como duplicado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can insert a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> at a specific index by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, pode inserir um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>num índice específico utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.AddAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to append.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto a acrescentar.

trans-unit.source: Inserts the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object in a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object at the specified index location.
trans-unit.target: Insere especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto na localização de índice especificado.

trans-unit.source: Use the AddAt method to insert the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> at the specified zero-based index.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método AddAt para inserir especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>o índice baseado em zero especificado.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> allows you to insert null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>permite-lhe inserir referências nulo (Nothing em Visual Basic), bem como duplicado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can append a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object to the end of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, pode acrescentar um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto até ao fim do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Add%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location at which to insert the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: A localização de índice baseado em zero no qual pretende inserir a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to add.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> o objeto a adicionar.

trans-unit.source: child is .
trans-unit.target: childis .

trans-unit.source: Empties the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Esvazia o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Clear method to remove every <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método Clear para remover todos os <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos de <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > To remove an individual node from the collection, use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A> or <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Para remover um nó individual da coleção, utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>ou <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object is in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Determina se especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto se encontra na coleção.

trans-unit.source: Use the Contains method to determine whether a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object is contained in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilizar o método contém para determinar se um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto está contido no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: This method is commonly used to test for the existence of a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object before performing a task, such as adding or removing the node from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Este método é normalmente utilizado para testar a existência de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto antes de executar uma tarefa, tal como adicionar ou remover o nó de coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to find.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto localizar.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object is contained in the collection; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto está contido na coleção; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object to a compatible one-dimensional array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> objects, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os itens do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto para uma matriz unidimensional compatível de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objetos, que começa no índice especificado na matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: Use the CopyTo method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> into the specified zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método CopyTo para copiar o conteúdo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>para especificado baseado em zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objeto.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Itens são copiados a partir do índice da matriz de destino especificado.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Com o <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objeto, em seguida, pode utilizar a sintaxe de matriz para aceder aos itens no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, também pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>método para criar um enumerador que pode ser utilizado para aceder aos itens na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based array of <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> objects that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Uma matriz baseada em zero do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objetos que recebe os itens copiados do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: A posição da matriz de destino no qual pretende iniciar a receber o conteúdo copiado.

trans-unit.source: Gets the number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o número de itens a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Count property to determine the number of items in a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize a propriedade de contagem para determinar o número de itens na <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This property is commonly used when iterating through a collection to determine the upper bound of the collection.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é normalmente utilizada quando repetir uma coleção para determinar o limite superior da coleção.

trans-unit.source: The Count property is also commonly used to determine whether a collection is empty.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade contagem também costuma é utilizada para determinar se uma coleção está vazia.

trans-unit.source: The number of items in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O número de itens a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Returns an enumerator that can be used to iterate through a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Devolve um enumerador que pode ser utilizado para iterar através de um <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the GetEnumerator method to create an enumerator that can be easily iterated through to get each item in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método GetEnumerator para criar um enumerador que pode ser facilmente iterated através de obter cada item no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: To get the item currently pointed to in the enumerator, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property.
trans-unit.target: Para obter o item atualmente indicado no enumerador, utilize o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method to move to the next item.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método para mover para o item seguinte.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: If you need to move the enumerator back to the beginning of the collection, use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: Se precisar de mover o enumerador de volta para o início da coleção, utilize o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > After you create an enumerator or use the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method, you must call the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> method.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Depois de criar um enumerador ou utilizar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método, tem de chamar o <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName>método.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.MoveNext%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Reset%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, the item represented by the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property is undefined.
trans-unit.target: Caso contrário, o item representado pelo <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade está definida.</xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator.Current%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to create an <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, também pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>método para criar um <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objetos que podem ser utilizados para aceder aos itens na coleção.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Another alternative is to use a `foreach` or `For Each` structure to iterate through the collection.
trans-unit.target: Outra alternativa consiste em utilizar um `foreach` ou `For Each` estrutura para iterar através da coleção.

trans-unit.source: An enumerator that can be used to iterate through the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um enumerador que pode ser utilizado para iterar através de <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Determines the index of the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Determina o índice especificado da <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the IndexOf method to determine the zero-based index of the specified <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método IndexOf para determinar o índice baseado em zero do especificado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: If the node is not in the collection, the method returns -1.
trans-unit.target: Se o nó não se encontra na coleção, o método devolve -1.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > If the specified node appears multiple times in the collection, the index of the first occurrence is returned.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > Se o nó especificado aparece várias vezes na coleção, o índice da primeira ocorrência é devolvido.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to locate.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto localizar.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the first occurrence of value within the , if found; otherwise, -1.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero da primeira ocorrência de value dentro de , se encontrado; caso contrário, -1.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o acesso à <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> é sincronizado (seguros para threads).

trans-unit.source: The IsSynchronized property is used to indicate whether access to the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> is synchronized (thread safe).
trans-unit.target: A propriedade IsSynchronized é utilizada para indicar se o acesso à <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>é sincronizado (seguros para threads).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This property is derived from the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> class and is overridden to always return `false`.
trans-unit.target: Esta propriedade é derivada de <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>classe e seja substituída para devolver sempre `false`.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: For more information on the IsSynchronized property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para obter mais informações sobre a propriedade IsSynchronized, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use this indexer to access a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object from the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> at the specified index using array notation.
trans-unit.target: Utilize este indexador para aceder a um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>de objeto do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>no índice especificado utilizando a notação de matriz.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The indexer allows you to modify or replace a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object in the collection directly.
trans-unit.target: O indexador permite-lhe modificar ou substituir um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto na coleção diretamente.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: The collection is zero-based.
trans-unit.target: A coleção é baseado em zero.

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index of the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to retrieve.
trans-unit.target: O índice baseado em zero do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> o objeto a obter.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object at the specified index in the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto no índice especificado no <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Removes the specified <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove o especificado <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> de objeto do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the Remove method to remove the specified node from the collection.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método de remover para remover o nó especificado da coleção.

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Todos os itens que se seguem nesse nó, em seguida, são movidos para cima para preencher a posição vacant.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices dos itens movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> can contain null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>podem conter referências nulo (Nothing em Visual Basic), bem como duplicado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a node at a specific index by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, pode remover um nó de um índice específico utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.RemoveAt%2A>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every node in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Também pode remover todos os nós na coleção utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object to remove.
trans-unit.target: O <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto para remover.

trans-unit.source: value is .
trans-unit.target: valueis .

trans-unit.source: Removes the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"></xref> object at the specified index location from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Remove o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode"> </xref> objeto na localização do índice especificado o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: Use the RemoveAt method to remove the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object at the specified zero-based index location from a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o método do RemoveAt para remover o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto na localização especificada índice baseado em zero de um <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: All items that follow that node are then moved up to fill in the vacant position.
trans-unit.target: Todos os itens que se seguem nesse nó, em seguida, são movidos para cima para preencher a posição vacant.

trans-unit.source: The indexes of the moved items are also updated.
trans-unit.target: Os índices dos itens movidos também são atualizados.

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> can contain null references (Nothing in Visual Basic), as well as duplicate <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>podem conter referências nulo (Nothing em Visual Basic), bem como duplicado <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can remove a specific <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> object by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, pode remover específico <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objeto utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Remove%2A> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>

trans-unit.source: You can also remove every node in the collection by using the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A> method.
trans-unit.target: Também pode remover todos os nós na coleção utilizando o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>método.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.Clear%2A>

trans-unit.source: The zero-based index location of the node to remove.
trans-unit.target: A localização de índice baseado em zero do nó para remover.

trans-unit.source: Gets an object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um objeto que pode ser utilizado para sincronizar acesso para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto.

trans-unit.source: The SyncRoot property provides a synchronized version of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> that can be used with synchronizing (threading) code.
trans-unit.target: A propriedade SyncRoot fornece uma versão sincronizada a <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>que podem ser utilizados com a sincronização (thread) do código.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!CAUTION] > The <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IsSynchronized%2A> property of this class always returns `false`, which indicates that the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> class is not synchronized (not thread safe).
trans-unit.target: > [!CAUTION] > O <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>propriedade desta classe sempre devolve `false`, que indica que o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>classe não está sincronizada (não seguros para threads).</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.IsSynchronized%2A>

trans-unit.source: Synchronizing code must perform operations on the SyncRoot object of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>, not directly on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> itself.
trans-unit.target: Sincronizar código tem de efetuar operações no objeto SyncRoot do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>, não diretamente no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>propriamente dito.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: This ensures proper operation of collections that are derived from other objects.
trans-unit.target: Isto assegura um funcionamento correto de coleções que são derivadas de outros objetos.

trans-unit.source: Specifically, it maintains proper synchronization with other threads that might be simultaneously modifying the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> object.
trans-unit.target: Especificamente, mantém sincronização adequada com outros threads que podem ser simultaneamente modificar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>objeto.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>

trans-unit.source: > [!NOTE] > The object returned in this implementation is the <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName> object used to store the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> objects in the collection.
trans-unit.target: > [!NOTE] > O objeto devolvido nesta implementação é o <xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>objecto utilizado para armazenar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode>objetos na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNode> </xref:System.Collections.ArrayList?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Enumerating through a collection is intrinsically not a thread-safe procedure.
trans-unit.target: Enumerar através de uma coleção intrinsecamente não é um procedimento seguro para thread.

trans-unit.source: Even when a collection is synchronized, other threads could still modify the collection, which causes the enumerator to throw an exception.
trans-unit.target: Mesmo quando uma coleção está sincronizada, outros threads ainda foi possível modificar a coleção, o que faz com que o enumerador acionar uma excepção.

trans-unit.source: To guarantee thread safety during enumeration, you can either lock the collection during the entire enumeration or catch the exceptions resulting from changes made by other threads.
trans-unit.target: Para garantir a segurança de thread durante a enumeração, pode bloquear a coleção durante a enumeração de toda ou detetar exceções resultantes das alterações efetuadas por outros threads.

trans-unit.source: For more information on the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A> property, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> property of the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> interface.
trans-unit.target: Para mais informações sobre o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>propriedade, consulte o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName>propriedade o <xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName>interface.</xref:System.Collections.ICollection?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot%2A?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.DataGridColumnCollection.SyncRoot%2A>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> que podem ser utilizados para sincronizar acesso para o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Copies all the items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object to a compatible one-dimensional <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, starting at the specified index in the target array.
trans-unit.target: Copia todos os itens do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto para um ecrã compatível com unidimensional <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>, começando no índice especificado na matriz de destino.

trans-unit.source: Use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A> method to copy the contents of the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> into the specified zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object.
trans-unit.target: Utilize o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>método para copiar o conteúdo do <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>para especificado baseado em zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objeto.</xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.CopyTo%2A>

trans-unit.source: Items are copied starting at the specified index of the target array.
trans-unit.target: Itens são copiados a partir do índice da matriz de destino especificado.

trans-unit.source: With the <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object, you can then use array syntax to access the items in the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.
trans-unit.target: Com o <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>objeto, em seguida, pode utilizar a sintaxe de matriz para aceder aos itens no <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection>.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection> </xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: As an alternative, you can also use the <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A> method to create an enumerator that can be used to access the items in the collection.
trans-unit.target: Como alternativa, também pode utilizar o <xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>método para criar um enumerador que pode ser utilizado para aceder aos itens na coleção.</xref:System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection.GetEnumerator%2A>

trans-unit.source: A zero-based <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> object that receives the copied items from the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Um baseado em zero <xref:System.Array?displayProperty=fullName> objeto que recebe os itens copiados do <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The position in the target array at which to start receiving the copied content.
trans-unit.target: A posição da matriz de destino no qual pretende iniciar a receber o conteúdo copiado.

trans-unit.source: array is not an array of objects.
trans-unit.target: arrayNão é uma matriz de objetos.

trans-unit.source: Gets a value indicating whether the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object is saving changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: Obtém um valor que indica se o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto está a guardar as alterações para o estado de vista.

trans-unit.source: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if the control is marked to save its state; otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>Se o controlo está marcado para guardar Estado; caso contrário, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Loads the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> object's previously saved view state.
trans-unit.target: Carrega a <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> objeto do anteriormente guardado o estado de visualização.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the saved view state values.
trans-unit.target: A <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> que contém os valores de estado de vista guardado.

trans-unit.source: Saves the changes to view state to a <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Guarda as alterações para ver o estado para um <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> that contains the view state changes.
trans-unit.target: O <xref:System.Object?displayProperty=fullName> que contém as alterações de estado de vista.

trans-unit.source: Instructs the <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"></xref> to track changes to its view state.
trans-unit.target: Indica o <xref href="System.Web.UI.WebControls.TreeNodeCollection"> </xref> para controlar as alterações para o estado de vista.

trans-unit.source: After this method has been called on a server control, the <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A> property will return `true`.
trans-unit.target: Depois deste método foi chamado no controlo de servidor, o <xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>irá devolver a propriedade `true`.</xref:System.Web.UI.Control.IsTrackingViewState%2A>
